body.name: Finish - Quantum - 82ct - Dishwasher Detergent - Powerball - Ultimate Clean & Shine - Dishwashing Tablets - Dish Tabs - Pack of 1 (Packaging May Vary)
features: Finish Quantum Scrubs, Degreases, and Shines. Because There’s Clean. Then There’s so Clean It Shines
3 Separate Fast Dissolving Chambers, Delivering 3 Different Power Actions
Powder: Scrubbing Power to Break Down and Remove Toughest Stuck on Food in One Wash. No need to pre-rinse or soak. Cuts through grease, breaks down and lifts away even 24-hour burnt, dried on food
Gel: Grease Cutting Power Handles Even the Toughest Messes
Liquid Powerball: Filled With Power Actions That Dry and Deliver a Finishing Boost of Shine
As the manufacturer of Finish, we’re here to support your shopping experience. You can call, or visit us on social for 24/7 support
body.description: "From the World's #1 Recommended Brand, Finish Quantum Max dishwasher detergent tackles whatever you throw at it. Our Powerball supercharges the capsule to tackle the toughest messes the first time for an ultimate clean & shine. Its multi-chamber dishwashing technology activates each of the three dish cleaning ingredients when it's needed during the cycle, so all you have to do is sit back and relax. The Shine & Protect Glass action ensures your glassware maintains a sparkling shine for longer, and the Silver Protection provides added protection for your silverware. Finish Quantum tablets are safe for septic systems. The tablets are easy-to-use, wrapper free & pre-measured to enhance your dishwashing experience. More dishwasher brands recommend Finish products Worldwide than any other brand. Recommendations as part of Co-marketing Agreements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Products works great as described. Great price and fast shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have always been a little skeptical of high end dishwasher detergents. Well, I can say that I've found a dishwasher detergent that completely exceeded my expectations – Finish Quantum Dishwasher Detergent!I've been using this detergent for a few months now, and the results have been consistently outstanding. Here's why I love it:Superior Cleaning Power: The cleaning power of this detergent is truly remarkable. Even those stubborn, baked-on food stains and greasy residues are no match for it. I've seen dishes go from grimy to gleaming in a single wash.No Residue Left Behind: Some dishwasher detergents can leave a chalky residue on glassware and dishes, but not this one. Everything comes out crystal clear and ready to use.Gentle on My Machine: In addition to getting my dishes clean, this detergent is gentle on my dishwasher. It helps prevent mineral buildup and keeps the interior looking and smelling fresh.Great Value for Money: The price point is excellent for the quality of cleaning it provides. It's definitely a cost-effective choice for anyone looking to make dishwashing easier.In summary, Finish Quantum Dishwasher Detergent has truly transformed my dishwashing routine. I no longer dread loading the dishwasher, and I'm confident that my dishes will come out spotless every time. If you want a detergent that cleans effectively, is gentle on your machine, and doesn't break the bank, give this one a try. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Worthy Alternative To More Expensive Brands
reviews.reviewText: I've used the Finish detergent pods for a few months and have been very pleased with the results. In years past, I've always used more expensive brands, but with my current budget, decided to give these a try. They work very well and while there is a scent, it's not terribly unpleasant or pungent. They clean dishes and utensils very well. I've noticed no film or scent present in my old dishwasher after I've run the cleaning cycle. Considering the results and price, I'll be buying this dish washing detergent again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans better than everything
reviews.reviewText: I have tried all different types of detergents for the dishwasher and about every major brand. This by far cleans the best. I like the tabs that has 3 different cleaning sections in one pod. The actual dishwasher smells fresher after the wash cycle. I'm not sure of this is an added bonus, but I was able to tell a difference. They stay fresh in the pod packs. I don't have to open anything, just pop them in the washer and turn it on. The dishes shine and are squeaky clean including the glasses and flatware. I won't use anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Cleaning with a Note on Packaging
reviews.reviewText: The Finish Quantum Dishwasher Detergent has proven to be a reliable choice for achieving ultimate clean and shine. The Powerball feature ensures that even tough stains and residues are effectively tackled, leaving dishes spotless and shining after each wash.The 82-count packaging provides good value for money, lasting for an extended period. However, be aware that the packaging may vary, which could be a consideration if you have specific preferences or storage constraints.Overall, I'm satisfied with the cleaning performance of Finish Quantum, and the convenience of the dishwasher tablets makes it a go-to option for hassle-free dishwashing. A solid choice for those seeking effective cleaning with the added benefit of long-lasting supply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dishwashers
reviews.reviewText: Liked this product very much, works very well in my dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work better than anything else we have used.
reviews.reviewText: No more pre-scrubbing coffee rings or dried on ketchup. These pods are worth the extra money because our dishes are squeaky clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used these a while. Smell great. Do their job!
reviews.reviewText: Been using these a while. I kept my old plastic container which was like a tub and just refill it with these pods. Good value. Wish it came in a tub instead of plastic pouch though. Glad I kept the tub. Seems to do a good job with dishes but I always scrub the food off with a brush prior to putting them in the dishwasher rack… I just don’t like the idea of putting plates in with food caked everywhere. In my opinion, these are great for my style.
These have mixed reviews, but I am happy to say that I have found them to be great and super value when buying on Amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: The product is excellent, cleans thoroughly
reviews.reviewText: The product is excellent, cleans thoroughly
